name: google-calendar
description: Google Calendar MCP Server for managing Google calendar events. Also supports searching for events by attributes like title and location.

examples.title: Add Event from Screenshot
examples.description: Add events from screenshots and images
examples.prompt: Add this event to my calendar based on the attached screenshot.

examples.title: Check Upcoming Events
examples.description: Discover upcoming events outside usual routines
examples.prompt: What events do I have coming up this week that aren't part of my usual routine?

examples.title: Check Attendance
examples.prompt: Which events tomorrow have attendees who have not accepted the invitation?

examples.title: Auto Coordinate Events
examples.description: Create events based on the available times provided
examples.prompt: Here's some available that was provided to me by someone. Take a look at the available times and create an event that is free on my work calendar.

examples.title: Check Availability
examples.description: Provide your availability checking both calendars
examples.prompt: Please provide availability looking at both my personal and work calendar for this upcoming week.
